channel.title: Tahira Ramzan on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Tahira Ramzan on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Forgotten Citizens: today's forgotten citizens
item.description: TR - Tahira Ramzan TR Hi my name is Tahira and I’m 30 years old. I used to go to Nautical College and I did a development course. I have 7 sisters, I’m the second oldest, I have one brother. I have a learning disability, so does my sister. People don’t always understand me, once I was walking down the street and a man started to throw money at me and I got scared.
